# Get input
n, k = map(int, input().split())
prices = list(map(int, input().split()))

# Sort prices
prices.sort()

# Get total price
total = 0
for i in range(k):
    total += prices[i]

# Print total
print(total)

import sys

n, k = map(int, sys.stdin.readline().split())
prices = list(map(int, sys.stdin.readline().split()))
prices.sort()
print(sum(prices[:k]))

N, K = map(int, input().split())
p = list(map(int, input().split()))
p.sort()
print(sum(p[:K]))

# Get input
n, k = map(int, input().split())
prices = list(map(int, input().split()))

# Sort prices
prices.sort()

# Get the minimum total price
print(sum(prices[:k]))

import sys

def main():
    n, k = map(int, sys.stdin.readline().split())
    p = list(map(int, sys.stdin.readline().split()))
    p.sort()
    print(sum(p[:k]))

if __name__ == '__main__':
    main()

# input
n, k = map(int, input().split())
p = list(map(int, input().split()))

# sort
p.sort()

# output
print(sum(p[:k]))

N, K = map(int, input().split())
prices = list(map(int, input().split()))
prices.sort()
print(sum(prices[:K]))
